/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Cars of various colors are parked along the sides of the street, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete structures.
